verses.verse: <S%H5186><s%> Hear, <S%H241><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and answer <S%H6030><s%> me, <S%H6041><s%> for I am poor and needy. <S%H6041><s%>
Preserve <S%H8104><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> for I am godly. <S%H2623><s%> You, <S%H430><s%> my God, save <S%H3467><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> who trusts in you. <S%H982><s%>
Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> to me, <S%H136><s%> Lord, for I call <S%H7121><s%> to you all day long. <S%H3117><s%>
Bring joy <S%H8055><s%> to the soul <S%H5315><s%> of your servant, <S%H5650><s%> for to you, <S%H136><s%> Lord, do I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
For you, <S%H136><s%> Lord, are good, <S%H2896><s%> and ready to forgive; <S%H5546><s%> abundant <S%H7227><s%> in loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> to all those who call on you. <S%H7121><s%>
Hear, <S%H238><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my prayer. <S%H8605><s%> Listen <S%H238><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my petitions. <S%H8469><s%>
In the day <S%H3117><s%> of my trouble <S%H6869><s%> I will call <S%H7121><s%> on you, <S%H6030><s%> for you will answer me.
There is no one like you among the gods, <S%H430><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> nor any deeds like your deeds. <S%H4639><s%>

All nations <S%H1471><s%> you have made <S%H6213><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H136><s%> Lord. They shall glorify <S%H3513><s%> your name. <S%H8034><s%>
For you are great, <S%H1419><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> wondrous things. <S%H6381><s%> You are God alone. <S%H430><s%>

Teach <S%H3384><s%> me your way, <S%H1870><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> I will walk <S%H1980><s%> in your truth. <S%H571><s%> Make my heart <S%H3824><s%> undivided <S%H3161><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> your name. <S%H8034><s%>
I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you, <S%H136><s%> Lord my God, <S%H430><s%> with my whole heart. <S%H3824><s%> I will glorify <S%H3513><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>
For your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> toward me. <S%H5337><s%> You have delivered my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the lowest <S%H8482><s%> Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>

God, <S%H430><s%> the proud <S%H2086><s%> have risen <S%H6965><s%> up against me. <S%H5712><s%> A company of violent <S%H6184><s%> men have sought <S%H1245><s%> after my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and they don't <S%H7760><s%> hold regard for you before them.

But you, <S%H136><s%> Lord, are a merciful <S%H7349><s%> and gracious <S%H2587><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> slow <S%H750><s%> to anger, <S%H7227><s%> and abundant in loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth. <S%H571><s%>

Turn <S%H6437><s%> to me, <S%H2603><s%> and have mercy on me! <S%H5414><s%> Give your strength <S%H5797><s%> to your servant. <S%H5650><s%> Save <S%H3467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of your handmaid. <S%H519><s%>

Show <S%H6213><s%> me a sign <S%H226><s%> of your goodness, <S%H2896><s%> that those who hate <S%H8130><s%> me may see <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H954><s%> and be shamed, because you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have helped <S%H5826><s%> me, <S%H5162><s%> and comforted me.
